# Simple test case for new command without customization.

dotm new myprofile

exists $HOME/.config/dotm/profiles/myprofile/.git
cmp expectedConfig $HOME/.config/dotm/config.toml

-- expectedConfig --
ignore_prefix = "_"

[profiles]
  [profiles.myprofile]
    path = "$HOME/.config/dotm/profiles/myprofile/"
    remote = ""
